idea: Our bakery manufacturing unit is state of the art modern, semi automatic and has imported equipments at Kaman, Mumbai. We customize & cater as per the needs of clients keeping in mind Consistent Quality, & Timely Service. We intend to be highly effective, lean & a fast moving organization by moving to complete automation in 2019.
name: CRANBERRY FOODS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Chemarc.com is the leading portal for chemical industry in India, offering useful
content & information, tools for digital marketing & for engaging with the online
community, (and specialised services and e-commerce in future). We are currently
 attracting over 350,000 industry professionals every month.
name: Chemarc

idea: Intex International has established itself as most trusted brand among its customer. At Intex International we have team of experienced professionals with focused aim of globally exporting handpicked products from different parts of India to the worldwide buyers at large. Our goods are crafted by skilled professionals from best raw materials, with love in heart and beauty of Indian culture & craftsmanship. Our areas of interest are into product exports and providing tailor made logistics solutions. In addition to that IITC has always been striving towards continuous development with aim to transform the logistic segment in an innovative way in order to  establish state of the art practices for holistic and sustainable growth of social capital and hence community.
name: INTEX INTERNATIONAL TRADING & CLEARING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We at GramworkX are looking to change the landscape of agriculture and its allied business.
With increasing demands in agricultural produce and vagaries of nature the confluence of agriculture and technology is inevitable. We want to be a part of this journey and make a change! At GramworkX we are building smart products at an affordable cost to the farmers for a sustainable future. We believe in incorporating analytics, automation, product and process innovation for better resource utilisation and help increase the productivity
name: GRAMWORKX AGROTECH PRIVATE LIMITED
